This pagedisplays thetop20 mostfrequentwords appearingin every transcription contained in the Documenting Racial Violence in Kentucky project: mob: 713 negro: 627 men: 441 jail: 439 county: 382 night: 302 taken: 241 morning: 233 body: 232 man: 228 said: 226 last: 187 house: 184 found: 183 shot: 178 near: 178 Lynching: 177 clock: 168 went: 168 made: 161
The following is a list ofwords deemed important by Dr: Nikki Brown, manager of the DRVK project: fiend: 12 brute: 21 rapist: 7 innocent: 14 murderer: 37 girl: 103
